import React from 'react' import "./testimonials.scss" export default function Testimonials() { [ { id: 1, name: "Nataša Jezdimirović", title: "Colleague", img: "assets/natasa.jpeg", icon: "assets/twitter.png", desc: "Nikolaj is great to work with. He is flexible, yet meets all the deadlines.", }, { id: 2, name: "Ognjen Srdić", title: "Colleague", img: "assets/ognjen.jpeg", icon: "assets/twitter.png", desc: "Always ready to help, great colleague and team member.", }, { id: 3, name: "Srđan Šuković", title: "Friend", img: "assets/srdjan.jpeg", icon: "assets/twitter.png", desc: "Excellent friend, he is funny and it is easy to talk with him.", }, ]; return (

Testimonials

{data.map((d)=>(
{d.desc}

{d.name}

{d.title}

))}
) }
